department.dept_long_name: Committee on Higher Degrees in Biostatistics

course.title: Principles and Advanced Topics in Clinical Trials
course.description: This course focuses on selected advanced topics in design, analysis, and interpretation of clinical trials, including study design; choice of endpoints (including surrogate endpoints); interim analyses and group sequential methods; subgroup analyses; and meta-analyses.
course.prerequisites: BIST 230, and BIST 231 (may be taken concurrently) or signature of instructor required.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the School of Public Health as BIO 238.
